Articles.Content:
I'm trying to emulate some rocket pieces that are supposed to be 3.2m diameter, but when I follow guides on the forum (ie, 1 unit = 1.25m) my piece is too small. That is, my piece that is 2.56units wide, turns out to be very marginally larger than a 2.5m piece.

Either the guides I'm reading/listening to are wrong/old or there's an understanding regarding internal/nominal sizes vs actual sizes that I'm completely unaware of.

Is this something that has changed from pre 0.9 to 0.9 beta?

Is there an official conversion?

Why aren't Americans using metric yet?

What is the air-speed of an unladen African Swallow?
